theme.reasoning: University portals require high readability for text-heavy content (forms, grades, notices). A clean, light theme conveys trust, openness, and professionalism.

usage.h1: font-serif text-5xl md:text-6xl font-bold tracking-tight text-primary
usage.h2: font-serif text-3xl md:text-4xl font-semibold tracking-tight text-primary
usage.label: font-sans text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-wider text-slate-400

primary.description: Deep Royal Blue - Trust, Intelligence, Authority

marketing.name: The Tetris Grid
marketing.usage: Use for Homepage, News, and Landing sections. Mix col-span-8 (hero) with col-span-4 (sidebar/stats).

dashboard.name: High Density Grid
dashboard.usage: Use for Admin/Student Dashboards. Strict alignment. Widgets should stretch to fill height.

rules: Marketing Pages: Use raw HTML/Tailwind for creative layouts. Do NOT use Shadcn Cards here.
Dashboards: Use Shadcn components (Cards, Tables, Forms) for consistency and functionality.
Forms: ALWAYS use Shadcn Form/Input components. Never native HTML inputs.
Buttons: Primary actions use 'brand-blue'. Secondary actions use 'outline' or 'ghost'.
Cards: Dashboard cards should be 'flat' (border only) or 'lifted' (shadow-sm) on hover.

specifics.sidebar: Fixed, Dark Mode (bg-slate-900 text-slate-300) for high contrast against the light dashboard content.
specifics.tables: Clean, minimal borders. Header text uppercase and small. Row hover effects mandatory.

rules: Hover: Subtle lift (-2px) and shadow increase for cards.
Lists: Staggered entrance for table rows and grid items.
Scroll: Use 'lenis' for smooth scrolling on the marketing homepage.

icons.usage: Use stroke-width={1.5} for a refined, elegant look.

images.description: Modern university building with dramatic sky. Use for Homepage Hero.
Green campus with modern building. Use for 'About Us' or 'Campus Life' section.
Student working in a modern library. Use for 'Academics' or 'Student Portal' login.
Students walking in plaza. Use for 'Community' or 'Events' section.

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic centered layouts or default blue gradients.
Depth: Use z-index and layered shadows to create depth.
Glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md or xl for overlays and sticky headers.
Transitions: NEVER use 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties (opacity, transform, colors).
Alignment: Do NOT center align the app container globally.
Buttons: Use pill-shaped or sharp buttons with micro-interactions.
Icons: NO Emojis. Use Lucide React icons.
Spacing: Use 2-3x more spacing than standard (p-8, p-12).
Testing: All interactive elements MUST have 'data-testid'.
instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Configure Tailwind: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the Brand Colors (Blue/Gold) and Fonts (Playfair/Manrope).
3. Global CSS: Import the Google Fonts in 'index.css' and set the base font families.
4. Layout Structure: Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Sidebar (Dashboard) vs Navbar (Marketing) logic.
5. Component Customization: Override Shadcn default styles to match the 'Old Money Tech' aesthetic (e.g., sharper corners on cards, serif headings in dialogs).
6. Dashboard Implementation: Build the Admin, Faculty, and Student dashboards using the 'High Density Grid'.
7. Marketing Implementation: Build the Homepage using the 'Tetris Grid' and the provided images.
8. Testing: Add 'data-testid' to all buttons, inputs, and links.
